column4: Does anyone know how to enable virtual users automatically on pure ftpd?
let me see if I can remember
I would appriciate your help very much
So, any idea how to autostart pureftpd with virtual users enabled?
oh
sudo /etc/init.d/pure-ftpd restart
Hmm, i had that on no already :(
did you restart?
currently, i have to do this command after ive killed the pureftpd process manually: "usr/local/sbin/pure-ftpd-mysql -j -lpuredb:/etc/pureftpd.pdb &"
yes, ive restarted it
that should work
and ive checked, i cant access the server with anon
It says "530 Sorry, but I can't trust you" when i try logging in with my virtual user
what ftp proram you using?
smartftpd, and fireftp
both have same problem
if i launch that command in terminal it works for both
yet it works fine on the server
can you pastebin some of the log files from /var/log/pure-ftp
okay, ill examine them myself quickly and then post them up on my server
I have just transfer.log in there...
link?
Im sorry, but this is the only line in my transfer.log - "xxx.xxx.xx.xx dsl.est.estpak.ee - ftp [28/Nov/2007:10:22:53 -0000] "GET /home/ftp/welcome.msg" 200 166"
hope i helped.
